value.name: First big event of the season held at Corner Ballpark in Detroit amid noise concerns
value.description: The first big event of the season at Corktown’s Corner Ballpark was held Saturday. It’s been a point of contention with neighbors of the Old Tiger Stadium, who have complained about the loud music, late nights and crowds.
